titleStmt.title: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 31: Antiphonary of the Church (Mə'əraf)

msIdentifier.idno: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 31: Antiphonary of the Church (Mə'əraf)

summary.p: Musical notation system used throughout. Small hand.

References: Mə'əraf is one of the five books in the collection Amməstu säwatəwä zemawoč, the Ethiopic divine office and indispensible to the performance for the office (therefore common not proper). This manuscript includes a selection of Psalms, daily office prayers, Mystagogia, and "school chants." See Aethiopica Encyclopedia, vol. 3, p. 910: For information on Mə'əraf chants, see Bernard Velat's Etudes sur le Me'eraf (Paris: 1966), vols 1 and 2.
